Title: Requires gunsmiths and firearms dealers to implement a plan for securing firearms, rifles and shotguns
Summary: Requires gunsmiths and firearms dealers to implement a plan for securing firearms, rifles and shotguns, including those transported in interstate commerce with the following minimum requirements for such security plan: display cases must be locked at all times; firearms, rifles and shotguns must be secured in a locked fireproof safe or vault in the licensed premises or in a similar secured and locked area; and ammunition must be stored and secured separately from the firearms, rifles and shotguns, and out of reach of the customers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to security requirements for gunsmiths and dealers in firearms
